issue.title: [CF 553] "Show variable text" not working, instead lagging client
issue.body:
The option "Show variable text" for tracking buffs/debuffs doesn't seem to work and instead, when checked, the client is lagging for the duration of the buff. Though, his doesn't seem to be the case with every buff, I tested it with Shield of the Righteous (3sec) and Hand of Freedom. It may only be the case when there is no variable to show (though I thought that Shield of the Righteous should show one)


> Posted by CurseForge user _dAda | Imported from CurseForge issue #553 | Raw

comments.body:
Not invalid, actually. There is an error occurring with this option.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Should be fixed in r560.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
